MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn affecting properties in Plas Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:48am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:11pm on the 17th February 2021.
